Name: Hyper Ionized Plasma Cannon
Description: The HIPC packs a wallop for captains at both ends of the barrel. Designed to be capital ships' medium range heavy artillery, this devastating device hyper-ionizes, super heats, and accelerates globs of hyperdrive fuel with horrific effects. Ships struck by the primary projectile suffer crippling heat load, massive damage, and interruption to their shielding and power systems.
